titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the establishing of the peace and quiet of the Church of England.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Arms, with leaf under lion's leg, and crowned initials "C R" at top.
Imperfect: first leaf only. Best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Great Britain. Public Record Office.
